did.unittitle: ILR School Metropolitan District Trade Union Health Education Project Papers, 1972- 1981

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: ILR School Metropolitan District Trade Union Health Education Project Papers #/4277. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes: course outline for "The Union Stake in Health Planning" and an application for a Health Services Training Grant from the Department of Health, Education and Welfare.
Dated January 5, 1973. Subject: Next Labor Advisory Committee Meets
Includes: "Proposal for Education and Training on Occupational Health and Safety"
Includes material on proposed Cornell Medical School program, "Health Services Education and Training for Unions and the Community"

did.unittitle: Occupational Safety and Health Training and Education Program
Expanded Training of Retired Trade Unionists

scopecontent.p: Proposal submitted to the University of the State of New York under Title IB of the Higher Education Act of 1965

did.unittitle: Workshops in Equal Employment Opportunity Studies

scopecontent.p: Winter-Spring 1981. Affirmative Action Programs; Conducting a Utilization Analysis; Preparing for a Compliance Review; EEO for the Handicapped; The Use of Statistics in EEO Planning and Litigation
Includes: Mental Health in the Workplace; Issues in Health Maintenance; Advanced Seminar in Job Safety and Health
